quest.name: Slope
quest.text: Edison has various tasks for you to complete.

step.text: Find the bag of money within the village.
step.hint: Supposedly, Edison lost a large sum of money somewhere within the village. Find it for him.

step.text: Wait until your path crosses Edison's.
step.hint: Edison hinted that you would meet again in the future.
Edison is blackmailing you to steal the crown jewel from the King.
